name: Konquest
description:
A fighting game taking Inspiration from Mortal Kombat. Fight as the prize fighter Mumei or as the savage viking warrior Sval. Engage in combat on a viking warship or in a dojo using special attacks and combos.

Created with the help of:

Film Team:
Jared Pearce - Portfolio
Alexander Kelly 
Lapana Taefu

Actors: 
Felix Maude 
Steven Wright
Romanego Youhanna

Design Team: 
Nero Ceresoli 

Hunter Lynch

Costume Design:

Amanda Mathews
